data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: After command byte 7, each time a character is sent to the display, the cursor remains in the same physical position and all the displayed characters move left by one place. Another ____ to ____ it ____ that ____ 16x2 ____ display ____ one ____ to ____ right ____ the ____ display ____ that, for ____, ____ it ____ displaying ____ 1-16, it ____ displays ____ 2-17. To see the text you print, you would first have to move the cursor to the right side of the display, otherwise everything you display would immediately be shifted off the left edge of the display, and would only re-appear on the right edge when you had printed another 24 characters (24 because the virtual display is 40 characters wide and the physical one 16 wide).
data.partBlankContent: After command byte 7, each time a character is sent to the display, the cursor remains in the same physical position and all the displayed characters move left by one place. Another w__ to s__ it i_ that t__ 16x2 phys____ display mo___ one pl___ to t__ right o_ the vir____ display s_ that, for exa____, i_ it w__ displaying col____ 1-16, it th__ displays col____ 2-17. To see the text you print, you would first have to move the cursor to the right side of the display, otherwise everything you display would immediately be shifted off the left edge of the display, and would only re-appear on the right edge when you had printed another 24 characters (24 because the virtual display is 40 characters wide and the physical one 16 wide).
data.fullContent: After command byte 7, each time a character is sent to the display, the cursor remains in the same physical position and all the displayed characters move left by one place. Another way to see it is that the 16x2 physical display moves one place to the right on the virtual display so that, for example, if it was displaying columns 1-16, it then displays columns 2-17. To see the text you print, you would first have to move the cursor to the right side of the display, otherwise everything you display would immediately be shifted off the left edge of the display, and would only re-appear on the right edge when you had printed another 24 characters (24 because the virtual display is 40 characters wide and the physical one 16 wide).
data.answer: 在命令字节7之后，每次一个字符被发送到显示时，光标保持在相同的物理位置，所有显示的字符向左移动一位。另一种看待它的方式是，16x2物理显示器在虚拟显示器上向右移动了一个位置，因此，例如，如果它显示列1-16，那么它就会显示列2-17。看你打印的文本,你首先需要移动光标的右侧显示,否则你显示的一切将立即转移的左边缘显示,和只会一会儿右边缘打印时另一个24个字符(24因为虚拟显示40个字符宽,宽物理一16)。
